issue.title: [C++] Improve performance of GenerateBitsUnrolled
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10598](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10598). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
internal::GenerateBitsUnrolled doesn't vectorize too well, there are some improvements we can make to get better code generation

comments.body:
